title: Comparison of multigroup eigenvalue solvers: Monte Carlo versus diffusion
abstract: Case 8 of a 3D Superphenix Sodium Fast Reactor static neutronic benchmark is used for comparing efficiencies of eigenvalue solvers based on two methods: neutron diffusion and Monte Carlo in a framework of the ROOSTER code.

links.description: A. Ponomarev, K. Mikityuk, L. Zhang, E. Nikitin, E. Fridman, F. Álvarez-Velarde, P. Romojaro Otero, A. Jiménez-Carrascosa, N. García-Herranz, B. Lindley, U. Baker, A. Seubert, R. Henry. Superphénix Benchmark Part I: Results of Static Neutronics, ASME J of Nuclear Rad Sci., ESFR-SMART Special Issue, January 2022, Vol.8, NERS-21-1046.
The ROOSTER code version used for the calculations.
The ROOSTER input file used for the calculations of Case 8.
The 25-group nuclear data used for the calculations.
